name: Senior Program - CORTLAND
description: The BHN Cortland Senior Center provides free food to seniors (aged 60 years and older) or adults with disabilities in the Bernal Heights community through the following food assistance programs: - Brown Bag Program: On Wednesdays, grocery bags of fresh fruits, vegetables, grains and other pantry items are provided. - Food Box Program: On the 2nd Saturday of every month, boxes of non-perishable food items (dry and canned goods) are provided to seniors qualified for the Commodity Supplemental Food
